SEARCH
Package Zoo

Class FantasticZoo

java.lang.Object
Zoo.FantasticZoo
public class FantasticZoo extends Object
The FantasticZoo class represents a zoo with various functionalities, including managing enclosures, creatures, and a zoo master.

      Parameters:
      oldEnclosureIndex - The index of the enclosure to be removed.

    • removeEnclosure

      public void removeEnclosure(Enclosure oldEnclosure)
      Removes an enclosure from the FantasticZoo if it is empty or explicitly specified, otherwise, displays a message indicating that creatures are still present.
      Parameters:
      oldEnclosure - The enclosure to be removed.
